customer.id.description: The ID of the customer associated with the campaign budget.

campaign.id.description: The ID of the campaign associated with the campaign budget.

campaign_budget.aligned_bidding_strategy.description: The ID of the bidding strategy aligned with the campaign budget.

campaign_budget.amount_micros.description: The amount in micros (millionths of the currency unit) for the campaign budget.

campaign_budget.delivery_method.description: The delivery method of the campaign budget (ACCELERATED or STANDARD).

campaign_budget.explicitly_shared.description: Indicates whether the budget is explicitly shared among multiple campaigns.

campaign_budget.has_recommended_budget.description: Indicates if there is a recommended budget for the campaign budget.

campaign_budget.id.description: The ID of the campaign budget.

campaign_budget.name.description: The name of the campaign budget.

campaign_budget.period.description: The time period covered by the campaign budget.

campaign_budget.recommended_budget_amoun.description: The recommended amount in micros for the campaign budget.

campaign_budget.recommended_budget_estim.description: Estimated change in weekly clicks if recommended budget is applied.
Estimated change in weekly cost in micros if recommended budget is applied.
Estimated change in weekly interactions if recommended budget is applied.
Estimated change in weekly views if recommended budget is applied.

campaign_budget.reference_count.description: The count of references to the campaign budget.

campaign_budget.resource_name.description: The resource name of the campaign budget.

campaign_budget.status.description: The status of the campaign budget.

campaign_budget.total_amount_micros.description: The total amount in micros of the campaign budget.

campaign_budget.type.description: The type of the campaign budget.
